backend/main.mo: Defines basket, item, and user profile management with authorization, storage mixins, and Stripe checkout logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, their associated files, components, and test IDs for basket and checkout functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains high-level summaries for numerous frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML root that loads the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app layout and router configuration with branding, header basket count, and route definitions.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Renders an access-denied UI with navigation back to the storefront.
Admin tool for editing item descriptions and uploading replacement images with validations and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/ItemCard.tsx: Displays an item card with image fallback, price formatting, and navigation to the item detail page.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout and shows admin or user controls based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/PriceEditor.tsx: Provides a UI to edit an item's price and save updates via mutation with validation and toasts.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Shows a dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter a name and saves the profile.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetup.tsx: Dialog allowing admins to configure Stripe secret key and allowed countries, saving via a mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBasket.ts: Manages a localStorage‑persisted basket of item IDs with add, remove, clear, and lookup utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state, login, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating items, user profiles, admin status, and branding through an actor interface.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripe.ts: Implements React Query hooks for Stripe config, checkout session creation, and session status retrieval via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and typography styles.
frontend/src/lib/idEncoding.ts: Utility functions to convert Uint8Array IDs to and from URL‑safe base64 strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBrandingPage.tsx: Admin UI allowing branding editing including store name, logo, and hero image with save actions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBulkUploadPage.t: Admin page for bulk uploading images as items with progress tracking and success/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Main admin dashboard showing Stripe configuration status and navigation to branding and setup sections.
frontend/src/pages/BasketPage.tsx: Displays basket items, handles item removal, checkout validation, and initiates Stripe checkout sessions.
frontend/src/pages/ItemDetailPage.tsx: Shows item details, supports adding to basket or buying immediately, and allows admin editing and Stripe setup if needed.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment-cancelled message with navigation options back to the storefront or basket.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Confirms successful payment, clears the basket, refreshes item data, and provides a link back to the storefront.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Fetches and displays all storefront items along with branding, including a hero section and item grid.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, architectural notes, and current storefront/admin requirements for an ocarina shop app.
